doc:
Linda Loredo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Linda_Loredo 0 Linda Loredo (June 20, 1907 – August 11, 1931) was an American-born actress and dancer of Mexican descent. She is most commonly associated with Spanish language versions of Laurel and Hardy short subjects. Her sister, Maria Loredo (1905-1998), was also an actress. Linda_Loredo ( June_20_,_1907 – August_11_,_1931 ) was an_American-born_actress_and_dancer of Mexican_descent . She is most_commonly associated with Spanish_language_versions of Laurel_and_Hardy_short_subjects . Her_sister , Maria_Loredo_(_1905-1998_) , was also an_actress .
